Class TomcatConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.sevenbits.telenote.config.TomcatConfig

  • @Configuration
public class TomcatConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    Configurates tomcat connectors.

    • Method Detail

      • servletContainer

        @Bean
public org.springframework.boot.context.embedded.EmbeddedServletContainerFactory servletContainer()
        If httpsEnabled is true, creates https connector and http connector that redirects to https. If httpsEnabled is false, returns default.
        Returns:

      • initiateHttpConnector

        private org.apache.catalina.connector.Connector initiateHttpConnector()
        Initiates http connector that redirects to httpsPort.
        Returns:
        http connector that redirects to httpsPort.

      • sslConnectorCustomizer

        @Bean(name="tomcatSslConnectorCustomizer")
public org.springframework.boot.context.embedded.tomcat.TomcatConnectorCustomizer sslConnectorCustomizer()
        Customize ssl connector. If httpsEnabled is true, creates ssl connector with specified settings. If httpsEnabled is false, does nothing.
        Returns:
        ssl connector or empty method.
